channel.title: How do i hide client files
channel.description: I was gonna release my 317 server but i don`t know how to hide the files and keep the run.bat left so they can`t mess with the files

item.title: How do i hide client files
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:9, topic:316471”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=413030.msg3043162#msg3043162 date=1259270995]

If it’s closed source you might aswell shove it up.

Your ass.
[/quote]

Not mine, his.[/quote]

I didn’t mean yours.

@op: basically you are releasing a server that people can only run and not customise, what is the point?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i hide client files
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

whats the point of making a closed source, most people want to use a server to base theirs off,
they can’t do this if its a closed source.
therefor it will be kinda useless,

but thats just my opinion

item.title: How do i hide client files
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

has few ways:

  1. Make special “Run.Bat” with files inside this “bat” file.
  2. Destroy ****.java files.

I’m using destroy .java files ! This way give no way to recode IP server =]
Just delete all text/java files! But don’t touch others like “class” files.
It will give u way to protect

Soon may give other better way

Read full topic
